headline: Makes guilt-free plastics from food waste

# **Plastic,****without the pollution****.**
At Genecis Bioindustries, we care about the beginning _and_ the end.
We're a climate biotech company turning organic waste into sustainable, biodegradable materials, offering a circular economy solution for products’ beginning and end of life.
[ Partner with us ](https://www.genecis.co/</partner>)
## Product Offerings
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/63eabc17f4e1f300ddc769ad/ed400ac3-0cf0-4f66-ba77-225679eb4a2b/GHC-Genecis-Icon-SingleUse.png)
  * ####  Single-Use Plastics 
Governments are rapidly banning single-use plastic packaging, including plastic bags. Genecis PHA plastic provides a responsible alternative to single-use plastic with the same properties as oil-based plastics.


![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/63eabc17f4e1f300ddc769ad/822cd5b0-7647-45c1-8c84-bd2bdfee70d3/GHC-Genecis-Icon-AutoTextiles.png)
  * ####  Automotive & Textiles 
Replacing harmful oil-based plastics with biodegradable PHAs presents an opportunity to differentiate your company as eco-friendly and environmentally conscious to your customers.
Genecis PHA is tunable: we can produce rigid and flexible PHAs to replace both automotive parts and softer textiles.


![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/63eabc17f4e1f300ddc769ad/87b0a371-5ce8-4709-aad3-a89b6db07031/GHC-Genecis-Icon-Packaging.png)
  * ####  Packaging 
Half of all plastic produced is designed to be used only once, resulting in an estimated 10 million tonnes of plastic ending up in the ocean each year.
By making the switch to Genecis PHA, your packaging can be composted or will naturally biodegrade, reducing environmental pollution without significantly increasing production costs.


![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/63eabc17f4e1f300ddc769ad/af98fa43-d042-449d-931f-245b8331950f/GHC-Genecis-Icon-Medical.png)
  * ####  Medical Tools & Products 
PHA plastic can be used in the production of medical implants, sutures, cardiac valves, vascular grafts, and other medical equipment and packaging.
Because Genecis PHA plastic is produced from natural materials, it can be utilized safely in medical procedures.


# We’re designing thefutureof plastics.
PHA is a safe and guilt-free alternative to traditional plastics. We engineer bioplastics that **rival the performance of traditional plastics** , offering a sustainable solution to plastic pollution. Our process is **lower in cost and emissions** than competing bioplastics producers because we use organic waste as a feedstock.
We work with businesses to **de-risk their transition to sustainable products** by helping them incorporate PHA and biomaterials into new product design, so they can **make a difference** without sacrificing quality or profitability. 
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/63eabc17f4e1f300ddc769ad/ee311ef7-42f4-404e-b3ca-548508d9cd78/Screen+Shot+2023-02-16+at+10.42.12+PM.jpg)
  * ####  Dream it — Polymer Development 
We’ll develop and test the ideal polymer formulation for a current or new product line. 
Genecis customizes PHA polymer composition to meet target biodegradability, functionality, and quality requirements for partners’ products.
  * ####  Build it — Rapid Product Development 
Let’s collaborate to develop new PHA-based products that align with your brand and sustainability goals. We'll work closely with you to ensure that the final product meets your specifications and is ready for commercialization.
  * ####  Grow it — Co-Branding 
Connect with consumers who care about sustainability and high-performance products. 
Stand out with innovative products with enhanced functionality. 
Increase sales and profitability while differentiating your products in a crowded marketplace.


## Partnerwith us
Let's build sustainable products together.
[ Learn more ](https://www.genecis.co/</partner>)
#### OUR SPONSORS & PARTNERS

generated_description:
Genecis Bio is on a mission to revolutionize the way we think about plastics. Founded in Toronto, Canada, in 2017, this innovative company aims to create guilt-free plastics from food waste, effectively addressing one of the most pressing environmental issues of our time: plastic pollution. As a member of the esteemed Y Combinator Batch W20, Genecis combines cutting-edge synthetic biology with a strong commitment to climate solutions.

With a team of about 30 dedicated employees, Genecis Bio focuses on turning organic waste into sustainable, biodegradable materials designed for a circular economy. Their main offerings include environmentally friendly alternatives to single-use plastics, automotive parts, textiles, and medical tools—their PHA (polyhydroxyalkanoates) plastics can biodegrade naturally, helping to reduce the massive amounts of plastic waste that end up in our oceans each year.

The company prides itself on developing bioplastics that not only rival the performance of traditional plastics but also come at a lower cost and with reduced emissions. They work closely with businesses to make the transition to sustainable product offerings easier, ensuring that companies can meet their sustainability goals without sacrificing quality or profitability.

Some noteworthy features of Genecis Bio include:

- **Sustainable Alternatives**: Their bioplastics serve as alternatives to harmful oil-based plastics in various applications such as automotive, packaging, and medical devices.
- **Customized Solutions**: Genecis offers tailored polymer development to meet specific needs for biodegradability and functionality.
- **Partnership Opportunities**: With a forward-thinking approach, they invite collaboration with businesses eager to adopt eco-friendly materials.

For those interested in learning more or partnering with Genecis Bio, you can find more details on their website: [Genecis Bio](https://www.genecis.co/). 

In summary, Genecis Bio is not just another startup in the climate tech space; it's a forward-looking company poised to make a real impact by harnessing the power of waste to create viable products, proving that sustainability and performance can go hand in hand. If you're keen on innovative solutions to combat plastic pollution, Genecis Bio might just be the breakthrough you’ve been waiting for.
